event.name: Atomik::Execute::Start
event.description: Fired at the beginning of a call to the Atomik::execute() method.
event.refparam: The view name associated to the action
Whether to render the view or return the action variables as an array
Whether to echo the view output or return it
Whether to throw an exception when the action and the view files are missing

Whether to render the view or return the action variables as an array
Whether to echo the view output or return it
Whether to throw an exception when the action and the view files are missing

event.name: Atomik::Execute::After
event.description: Fired after the inclusion of the action file.
